testcase.name: Free CRM Create new deal scenario
Free CRM Login Test Scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on Login Page.........................................passed When title of login page is Free CRM........................................passed Then user enters "ktm000" and user enters "qazwsx"..........................passed Then user clicks on login button............................................passed Then user is on home page...................................................passed Then close the browser......................................................passed

testcase.name: user can create new contact
testcase.system-out: Given user "ktm000" "qazwsx" is already on Home Page........................passed When user hover over contacts link..........................................passed Then user clicks on New Contact link........................................passed Then user enters "Mrs.", "aa1" and "bb2" Names..............................passed Then user clicks on Save Btn................................................passed Then verify new contact "aa1" and "bb2" created.............................passed Then tear down..............................................................passed

testcase.name: user can create new contact 2
testcase.system-out: Given user "ktm000" "qazwsx" is already on Home Page........................passed When user hover over contacts link..........................................passed Then user clicks on New Contact link........................................passed Then user enters "Dr.", "cc1" and "dd2" Names...............................passed Then user clicks on Save Btn................................................passed Then verify new contact "cc1" and "dd2" created.............................passed Then tear down..............................................................passed
